content.question: Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="R sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="R sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="R sub 3" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>, the resistances of resistors <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"> <mn>1</mn> </math>, <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, and <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="R sub 2 is greater than, open parenthesis, R sub 1 equals R sub 3, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, R sub 1 equals R sub 3, close parenthesis, is greater than R sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="R sub 1 is greater than R sub 3, which is greater than R sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="R sub 2 is greater than R sub 3, which is greater than R sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="R sub 1 is greater than R sub 3, which is greater than R sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
